title: "ZOOM account utilization"
format: pdf

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
library(scales)
```

You can add options to executable code like this

```{r}
#| echo: false

zoom_events <- list.files(path = here("raw-data"), 
                          pattern = "*.csv", 
                          full.names = TRUE) %>%
  map_df(read_csv) |> 
  clean_names() |>
  mutate(start_time = mdy_hms(start_time),
         date = as.Date(floor_date(start_time, unit = "month")))

write_rds(zoom_events, here("data", "zoom_events.rds"))
```


```{r}
zoom_events |> 
  select(department, user_type, group,
archiving, phone, vo_ip, x3rd_party_audio, video, screen_sharing, recording, poll, q_a, survey, crc, encryption
  ) |>
  pivot_longer(everything()) |>
  count(name, value) |>
  arrange(name, value) |> 
  print(n = 500)
```
